Blue Ridge is a very popular vacation destination, especially in the fall when leaf color is at its peak, but the pristine mountain lake draws a crowd during the summer months as well.
Blue Ridge is located 90 miles north of Atlanta and is easily reached by taking I-75N to I-575 (exit 268). I-575 will become Hwy 515/76 as you drive north and will take you directly into Blue Ridge.

value: content=A 503-acre resort with 102 lodge guest rooms and 32 cottage guest rooms; 5 one-bedroom suites are also located in the lodge.  Offers mountain elegance for all ages, moderate climate for outdoor escapes in the surrounding forests of the Blue Ridge Mountains, and year-round championship golf.

content=Provides beautiful, privately owned luxury vacation cabins in the North Georgia mountains. All of the properties are fully equipped and offer upscale furnishings, hot tubs and fireplaces. Many offer pool tables, game rooms and spectacular year-round mountain views. Cabins are conveniently located near Lake Blue Ridge, white water rafting on the Ocoee River, horseback riding, tubing, hiking and the antique shops on Main Street.

content=Features beautiful log homes in the north Georgia mountain town of Blue Ridge. All properties offer hot tubs, fireplaces, satellite or cable TV, and fully equipped kitchens. Most have pool tables and many are pet friendly. Settings range from mountain top with spectacular mountain views to cabins located on the banks of the Toccoa River or Fightingtown Creek. Priced to suit every vacation budget from small cozy cabins to luxury vacation homes.
name=Rainbow Cabin Rentals of North Georgia

content=Blue Ridge. Riverfront vacation cabin rentals located on North Georgiaâ€™s most pristine Rivers and trout streams. Cabins are just 60-90 minutes north of Atlanta, Georgia - in the heart of the North Georgia mountains and sit on a river or large trout stream. Each cabin offers several, if not all of these features - seclusion, hot-tub, pool tables, open great rooms with fireplaces, rustic furnishings, outdoor fire pits, hammocks, decks with gorgeous views of nature & whitewater.

content=B&B 2 miles from town, perched on the mountainside with a beautiful view.  Four bedrooms each with private bath, including luxury sheets and towels. Full candlelight breakfast, hillside firepit, multiple porch swings and much more!

content=Pet Friendly North Georgian Mountain Cabin Rentals offers 40 Luxury log homes situated on 1500 acres in the private mountain top neighborhood of My Mountain.  Long range layered mountain views of North Georgia and the Smokey Mountains. Private Hot tubs, up-scale rustic lodge-style furnishings, rock hearth wood burning and gas log fireplaces (we supply the firewood October thru May), gas and charcoal barbeques, easy paved access, fully furnished, 10 minutes from the small mountain town of Blue Ridge in North Georgia. Very Pet Friendly, discounts, specials.  Close to horse back riding, hiking, mountain biking, trout fishing, Lake Blue Ridge and Lake Nottly fishing and boating, jet ski rentals, motorcycling (Tail of the Dragon is 60 minutes away), 90 minutes from Atlanta and Chattanooga airports. 800-844-4939

content=Mountain Escapes is a premier Georgia cabin rental company with vacation cabin rentals in the beautiful, North Georgia mountains, about 90 minutes north of Atlanta, GA or 90 minutes southeast of Chattanooga, TN.
address=3387 E 1st St  Blue Ridge GA
content=Vacation cabin rentals in North Georgia.  Log cabins with mountain and river views. Reserve your own vacation cabin rentals online or we'll help find the right place for you."
